title: To Be Like Her...
description: Edee Reed thought she had the perfect life…A simple life, a great family, good friends, married to a handsome and loving man…She had a roof over her head, food in her belly and love in her heart…Until him…Until Ashford Bradley Keating II walked into her simple life and turned her whole world upside down, inside out, leaving it crumbed in pieces at her feet.
author: Madeline Sheehan
